text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump AMERICAN CARNAGE: Trump didn’t cause the Covid-19 pandemic, but he made it worse (blame-gaming, musing about injection of disinfectants, etc.). Can we trust him to stop the bleeding? Here's how he helped hurricane victims: lobbing rolls of paper towels!
https://t.co/MpueHB7lII
